function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Gaps in CASBEE's response to Prevention of virus propagation indicators PVP1, PVP2, and PVP3","Impact":"Increased risk of virus propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Develop and implement measures for virus prevention and containment","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV-C light sanitization","People":"Occupants, visitors, and staff in built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Missing indicators for Water management in the Environmental Resources category","Impact":"Reduced focus on efficient water use and conservation","Mitigation":"Implement water management strategies and technologies","Technologies":"Water-saving fixtures, rainwater harvesting systems","People":"Building occupants, environmental conservation organizations","Owner":"Building owners, sustainability managers"},{"Description":"Partially addressed indicators in Personal comfort and Local services categories","Impact":"Reduced attention to occupant comfort and access to local amenities","Mitigation":"Enhance personal comfort and local service provisions","Technologies":"Smart climate control systems, community engagement platforms","People":"Building occupants, local communities","Owner":"Property developers, community organizations"}]}
